title: Job Vacancies at Westfield Consulting
content:
Westfield Consulting was founded in January 2012, by a team of Nigerians with over 45 years of cumulative work experience in management and consultancy. Westfield Consulting is a provider of Human Resource and Strategic Management Services.

Our focus on innovation and excellence in service delivery has made us a first choice to our growing clientele in various sectors. We have successfully achieved a positive work force attitude, while engineering a more motivated and committed workforce for our clients with notable results Our results provide a testament about the quality of our services. 70% of our business is repeat business.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Shift Supervisor
     

            
    



Job Location: Mowe, Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	Oversee and manage specific production lines during assigned shifts, ensuring efficient operations, quality control, and environmental compliance.
	Supervise line staff, maintain equipment, and implement safety and environmental protocols.


Key Responsibilities
Line Operations:


	Manage production lines to meet quality and production targets.
	Supervise and train line staff to achieve production goals.
	Monitor and optimize production processes to minimize waste and reduce costs.


Environmental:


	Implement and maintain environmental management systems (EMS) and procedures on the production line.
	Monitor and reduce waste, emissions, and energy consumption on the line.
	Conduct regular environmental inspections and audits on the line.
	Respond to and investigate environmental incidents on the line.


Safety:


	Ensure a safe working environment on the production line.
	Enforce safety protocols and conduct regular safety inspections.
	Investigate and address safety incidents on the line.


Maintenance:


	Monitor maintenance of production line equipment.
	Schedule and coordinate maintenance activities with the maintenance team.
	Ensure timely repair and replacement of equipment.


Quality:


	Ensure quality control measures are in place and effective on the production line.
	Monitor and address quality issues on the line.


Communication:


	Communicate with other shifts, management, and departments.
	Provide shift reports and performance updates.


Key Requirements


	BSc / B.Engr. / HND
	Minimum of 7 years of experience in the Manufacturing Industry.
	Strong recycling experience
	Ability to work with little or no Supervision
	A dynamic and astute goal-getter.


Salary
N215,000 – N350,000 per month (Gross Salary).

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: cvs@westfield-consulting.com with victor.allu@westfield-consulting.com in copy using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

 

2.) Technical / Maintenance Manager

Job Location: Mowe, Ogun 
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities


	Overall understanding of requirements for the Maintenance of equipment
	Ability to coordinate and understand the design requirements of the equipment
	Compliance with the proactive maintenance schedule set by management & OEM, and management of our main and auxiliary equipment. (proactive, preventive, corrective)
	Establish and comply with the preventive maintenance schedule set by management & OEM
	Adherence to the maintenance budget
	Report maintenance-related issues.


Key Requirements


	B.Eng. / HND qualification
	Minimum of 10 years of experience in the Manufacturing Industry.
	Recycling plant experience
	Strong experience in Mechanical Engineering and as well dabble into Electrical aspect of maintenance
	Ability to work with little or no Supervision
	A dynamic and astute goal-getter.


Salary
N700,000 – N900,000 per month (Gross Salary).

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: cvs@westfield-consulting.com with victor.allu@westfield-consulting.com in copy using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

 

 

3.) Mechanical Engineer

Job Location:  Mowe, Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities


	Carry out daily routine maintenance checks and log recording
	Basic mechanical installation, maintenance & repair
	Carry out scheduled preventive maintenance
	Setting and adjusting industrial machine blades.
	Installation, maintenance, and repair of the mechanical system
	Collaborate with team members to identify and solve complex engineering problems.
	Review machine performance and take necessary actions where appropriate.


Key Requirements


	B.Engr. / HND / OND / Trade Test
	Minimum of 4 years of experience in the Manufacturing Industry.
	Strong knowledge of trouble shooting and problem solving
	A dynamic and astute goal-getter.


Salary
N154,000 – N400,000 per month (Gross Salary).

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: cvs@westfield-consulting.com with victor.allu@westfield-consulting.com in copy using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

title: Job Openings at Uleval Technology
content:
Uleval Technology is an indigenous tech company specialized in Web design and creation, App development and maintenance, content creation, video production and editing. We also train on web design, graphics, social media management, content production, video coverage and editing.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Social Media & Digital Marketing Executive

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Description
     

            
    




	We are seeking a creative, data-driven, and sales-oriented Social Media & Digital Marketing Executive to manage and grow our media company’s online presence across multiple platforms.
	This role is responsible for building brand visibility, driving audience engagement, and converting followers into customers through the sale of merchandise and digital/physical products using platforms such as TikTok, Facebook, Instagram, X (Twitter), and YouTube.
	The ideal candidate understands content creation, social commerce, paid ads, analytics, and community building, and can translate online engagement into measurable revenue.


Key Responsibilities
Social Media Management & Growth:


	Manage daily operations of all social media platforms (TikTok, Facebook, Instagram, X, YouTube, etc.)
	Develop and execute monthly social media content calendars aligned with brand goals
	Grow followers, reach, impressions, and engagement organically and through paid campaigns
	Monitor trends, hashtags, viral content, and platform updates to stay ahead


Content Creation & Creative Direction:


	Create engaging, high-quality content including:
	
		Short-form videos (Reels, TikTok, Shorts)
		Graphics, memes, carousels, and motion posts
		Product-focused content and promotional creatives
	
	
	Collaborate with designers, videographers, and editors where necessary
	Write compelling captions, hooks, CTAs, and storylines tailored to each platform
	Ensure brand voice, tone, and visual identity are consistently applied


Social Commerce & Product Sales:


	
	Drive sales of merchandise and products directly via:

	
		TikTok Shop
		Facebook & Instagram Shops
		Direct messages and social funnels
	
	
	Plan and execute product launch campaigns, flash sales, and promotions
	Work closely with inventory and fulfillment teams to ensure smooth order processing
	Track conversions, revenue, and customer behavior from social channels.


Paid Advertising & Campaign Management:


	
	Plan, launch, and optimize paid ad campaigns on:

	
		Facebook & Instagram Ads
		TikTok Ads
	
	
	Define campaign objectives (awareness, engagement, conversions, retargeting)
	Monitor ad performance and optimize creatives, copy, and targeting
	Manage ad budgets and ensure maximum ROI


Community Management & Brand Engagement:


	Respond to comments, DMs, and inquiries in a timely and professional manner
	Build and nurture an active online community
	Handle feedback, reviews, and customer concerns effectively
	Engage influencers, creators, and brand ambassadors when needed


Analytics, Reporting & Optimization:


	Track performance metrics such as:
	
		Engagement rate
		Follower growth
		Reach and impressions
		Sales and conversion metrics
	
	
	Prepare weekly and monthly performance reports
	Use insights to improve content strategy and sales outcomes.


Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)


	Growth in followers and engagement
	Revenue generated from social media sales
	Campaign performance and ROI
	Content consistency and quality
	Community response time and satisfaction.


Required Skills & Qualifications
Experience & Education:


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor`s Degree
	2–5 years experience in social media or digital marketing (preferred)
	Experience in media, entertainment, fashion, or e-commerce is an added advantage
	Relevant certifications in digital marketing or social media are a plus


Core Skills:


	Proven experience managing social media for a brand or media company
	Strong understanding of TikTok, Facebook, Instagram, and social commerce tools
	Content creation skills (video, graphics, copywriting)
	Basic graphic design and video editing skills (Canva, CapCut, Adobe, etc.)
	Knowledge of paid ads and digital marketing funnels.


Technical & Marketing Skills:


	Experience with TikTok Shop, Meta Commerce, or similar platforms
	Familiarity with analytics tools (Meta Insights, TikTok Analytics, Google Analytics)
	Understanding of influencer marketing and collaborations
	Ability to convert engagement into sales.


Soft Skills:


	Creative and trend-aware
	Results-driven and sales-focused
	Strong communication and storytelling skills
	Ability to work independently and meet deadlines
	Strong attention to detail.


Application Closing Date: 20th January, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their application to: jobs@uleval.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: This is not a job for freelancers.

 

 

2.) Waiter / Waitress

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	Your job involves greeting guests, presenting menus, taking food/drink orders, serving meals, ensuring customer satisfaction, and processing payments, acting as the main link between diners and kitchen staff for a smooth dining experience, requiring skills like endurance, communication, and professionalism to handle various tasks and customer needs.
	Duties extend to recommending specials, managing table cleanliness, and resolving complaints, with specific tasks varying from casual to fine dining.


Key Responsibilities


	Guest Interaction: Welcome guests, seat them, present menus, answer questions, and provide recommendations.
	Order Management: Accurately take and enter orders into POS systems, communicate with kitchen/bar staff.
	Service Delivery: Serve food and drinks efficiently, ensuring timely delivery and attentive service.
	Table Maintenance: Clear tables, restock supplies, and keep the dining area clean and organized.
	Payment Handling: Prepare bills, process payments, and manage transactions accurately.
	Customer Satisfaction: Check in with diners, address concerns, handle complaints, and ensure a positive experience.


Essential Skills & Qualities


	Customer Service: Friendly, attentive, and patient.
	Communication: Clear communication with guests and staff.
	Multitasking: Handle multiple tables and requests efficiently.
	Physical Stamina: Ability to stand and walk for long periods.
	Problem-Solving: Resolve issues calmly and effectively.
	Coordination: Carry trays and plates without dropping items.


Application Closing Date: 21st January, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: jobs@uleval.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

3.) Housekeeper

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	Your job involves maintaining cleanliness and order in the hotel through tasks like dusting, vacuuming, mopping, sanitizing, making beds, managing laundry, and restocking supplies, requiring attention to detail, physical stamina, and reliability to create a sanitary and pleasant environment.
	Key duties include general cleaning, handling trash, reporting maintenance issues, and sometimes errands or cooking, while essential requirements are often experience, time management, and physical ability to lift and stand for long periods


Key Responsibilities


	Cleaning & Sanitizing: Dusting, sweeping, mopping, vacuuming, disinfecting surfaces, cleaning kitchens, bathrooms, and common areas.
	Bedding & Linens: Making beds, changing linens, and managing laundry.
	Supplies Management: Replenishing toiletries, towels, and cleaning supplies.
	Waste Management: Collecting and disposing of trash and recycling.
	Maintenance Reporting: Identifying and reporting needed repairs or damages.
	Special Tasks (Private Homes): May include cooking, running errands, or organizing.


Essential Skills & Qualifications


	Experience: Previous cleaning or housekeeping experience.
	Attention to Detail: A keen eye for cleanliness and order.
	Physical Stamina: Ability to lift, bend, and stay active.
	Time Management: Efficiently managing tasks and time.
	Independence: Ability to work unsupervised.
	Communication: Good communication and ability to follow instructions.
	Professionalism: Maintaining a positive attitude and respecting privacy (especially in private residences).


Application Closing Date: 20th January, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their application to: jobs@uleval.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: Job Vacancies at MacTay Consulting
content:
MacTay Consulting is one of the first and leading management consulting firms in Nigeria, providing HR services to our clients in Africa since 1982. We focus on adding value to organisations through customized solutions that meet our clients’ needs. We have a proven track record of providing excellent services that impact our clients’ businesses.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Bible Teacher (Children’s Ministry)

Job Location: Ikoyi, Lagos
Employment Type: Part-Time (Twice Monthly)

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a dedicated and passionate Bible Teacher to teach children twice a month. The ideal candidate will be responsible for delivering engaging, age-appropriate Bible lessons and helping children develop strong Christian values in a fun and interactive learning environment.


Key Responsibilities


	Teach Bible lessons to children twice a month in an engaging, relatable, and age-appropriate manner.
	Prepare lesson plans, activities, and materials ahead of each session.
	Communicate biblical principles clearly and creatively to young learners.
	Foster a safe, welcoming, and nurturing classroom environment.
	Collaborate with church/children’s ministry leadership on curriculum planning when needed.
	Maintain proper discipline and ensure the safety of all children during classes.
	Provide feedback to parents or leadership when required.


Requirements


	Strong knowledge of the Bible and Christian teachings.
	Previous experience teaching or working with children is an advantage.
	Excellent communication and storytelling skills.
	Creativity and ability to engage young learners.
	Must be punctual, reliable, and committed to scheduled teaching days.
	Resides in or can easily commute to Ikoyi.


Salary
N15,000 – N20,000 per teaching session (twice monthly).

Application Closing Date: 15th January, 2026.

Click here to apply online

 

 

2.) Contact Center Agent (Debt Recovery)

Job Location: Ilupeju, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements


	Year of experience - Minimum of 1 year of experience
	Qualification - HND/BSc
	Previous experience in contact center and customer service role is a great advantage.


Salary
N100,000 Net per month + other benefits.

Application Closing Date: 31st January, 2026.

Click here to apply online

 

 

3.) Physical Therapist (Post-Op Cervical Care Specialist)

Job Location: Ikoyi, Lagos

Job Summary


	We are seeking a highly skilled and compassionate Physical Therapist to provide specialized rehabilitation care for a patient recovering from Anterior Discectomy and Cervical Fusion (ADCF).
	The successful candidate will focus on restoring cervical range of motion, improving postura+6l alignment, and strengthening supporting musculature while strictly observing all post-surgical precautions.


Key Responsibilities


	Patient Assessment: Conduct thorough evaluations of the patient’s post-operative condition, including neurological status, incision healing, mobility, and functional limitations.
	Manual Therapy: Apply appropriate manual therapy techniques such as massage and soft tissue mobilization to alleviate muscle guarding, spasms, and scar tissue tension in the cervical and upper thoracic regions.
	Stretching Protocols: Implement gentle, progressive stretching programs to improve flexibility of the neck, shoulders, and chest while maintaining the integrity of the surgical fusion.
	Therapeutic Exercises: Develop and supervise a personalized exercise regimen emphasizing deep cervical flexor activation, scapular stabilization, and core strengthening.
	Patient Education: Educate the patient on proper posture, ergonomics, and safe neck movements to support recovery during daily activities.


Qualifications


	Bachelor’s or Doctorate degree in Physical Therapy (DPT preferred) with valid professional licensure.
	Proven experience in orthopedic or neurological rehabilitation, particularly with post-surgical spinal patients.
	Strong proficiency in manual therapy techniques.
	In-depth knowledge of ADCF procedures, recovery timelines, and contraindications.


Salary
N15,000 - N30,000 daily.

Application Closing Date: 10th January, 2026.
